mapper.insert: INSERT INTO curation ( member_id, egg_allergy, milk_allergy, wheat_allergy, buckwheat_allergy, peanut_allergy, soy_allergy, pine_nut_allergy, almond_allergy, walnut_allergy, crab_allergy, shrimp_allergy, squid_allergy, mackerel_allergy, shellfish_allergy, peach_allergy, tomato_allergy, chicken_allergy, pork_allergy, beef_allergy ) VALUES ( #{member_id}, #{egg_allergy}, #{milk_allergy}, #{wheat_allergy}, #{buckwheat_allergy}, #{peanut_allergy}, #{soy_allergy}, #{pine_nut_allergy}, #{almond_allergy}, #{walnut_allergy}, #{crab_allergy}, #{shrimp_allergy}, #{squid_allergy}, #{mackerel_allergy}, #{shellfish_allergy}, #{peach_allergy}, #{tomato_allergy}, #{chicken_allergy}, #{pork_allergy}, #{beef_allergy} )
